spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall footprint is loosely similar, but multiple room boundaries are not respected. The 2D plan’s clear separation of PLAYROOM (top-right), KITCHEN (right-center), DINING (bottom-center), LIVING (left), FOYER/CLOSETS/WC/STAIRS (top-left/top-center) is not cleanly reproduced. Stair core at top-center is not clearly present/legible in the 3D, and the foyer/closet/WC cluster appears merged/simplified. Dining-room bay/projection and several wall jogs are not matched, causing noticeable proportion and wall-alignment drift. Door and window locations/counts do not correspond well to the plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Several partitions appear omitted or relocated (notably around the stair/foyer/WC/closets and between dining/living transitions), breaking intended adjacency. Wall thicknesses look generally consistent, but openings are not embedded where the plan indicates. The render reads as a simplified open plan, introducing/omitting separations compared to the 2D drawing.

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen island/counter concept exists, but its shape/placement does not clearly match the plan’s island and perimeter runs. Other key plan elements (dining table zone, living layout hints) are not mapped; several built-ins/casework forms appear generic and not anchored to the 2D symbols. Scale of some casework elements appears inconsistent with surrounding circulation widths.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean, readable massing with decent lighting and minimal rendering artifacts. Camera is isometric-like but not strictly orthographic; perspective is present. Geometry is generally clean, but simplification and ambiguous room definition reduce clarity relative to the source plan.

detected_errors.description: Stair (UP/DN) at the top-center of the 2D plan is not clearly represented as a stair element in the 3D render.
FOYER / closet / WC cluster (top-left/top-center in plan) appears spatially merged/simplified and does not match the plan’s compartmentalized layout.
DINING ROOM footprint/proportions (including the bottom bay/projection and wall jogs shown in plan) are not preserved in the 3D model.
Interior wall alignment between LIVING–DINING–KITCHEN zones does not follow the plan; separations and transitions appear shifted or removed.
Several plan-indicated windows (multiple along living room exterior, dining bay windows, and playroom/kitchen exterior windows) are missing in the 3D render.
Window placement that does exist in the 3D appears inconsistent with the plan’s window locations/spacing on the exterior walls.
Exterior door placements (e.g., bottom-right door swing shown near kitchen/dining area and other exterior openings) are not clearly matched in the 3D render.
Generic built-in/casework features and partition fragments appear in the 3D without clear correspondence to any 2D plan symbols or dimensions.
Room proportions (especially right-side kitchen/playroom depth vs. left living area) appear distorted relative to the plan’s dimensioned extents.
